name: Glam Doc
description:
Made for the Godot Wild Jam #18, using Godot3.2.

You, the Glam Doc, have found yourself in a disco while escaping the zombie apocalypse. Kill the zombies with your gun or fists, earn phat points, buy health and ammo and survive the increasing waves of zombies!

- Move with WASD,

- shoot with left mouse,

- punch with right mouse.
